119.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan (1989)
119.movie_plot: A boatful of graduating high school students headed to Manhattan accidentally pull Jason Voorhees along for the ride.

111.movie_name: Return of the Texas Chainsaw Massacre, The (1994)
111.movie_plot: This 55 minute documentary includes on-set footage and interviews with the cast and crew. It is a fascinating behind-the-scenes look at the film that went on to become the black sheep of the Texas Chainsaw franchise.

117.movie_plot: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

118.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood (1988)
118.movie_plot: Years after Tommy Jarvis chained him underwater at Camp Crystal Lake, the dormant Jason Voorhees returns to the camp grounds when he is accidentally released from his prison by a telekinetic teenager.

122.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

123.movie_name: King Kong vs. Godzilla (Kingukongu tai Gojira) (1962)
123.movie_plot: A pharmaceutical company captures King Kong and brings him to Japan, where he escapes from captivity and battles a recently released Godzilla.

125.movie_plot: Jafar comes for revenge on Aladdin, using a foolish thief and Iago's treachery to find a way back into power.

127.movie_plot: A heartfelt documentary focusing on the lives of professional wrestlers and how their sport is not fake.

102.movie_plot: Godzilla saves Tokyo from a flying saucer that transforms into the beast Orga.

121.movie_plot: Maximillian is the only survivor from a race of vampires on a Caribbean Island, and as a vampire, he must find a mate to keep the line from ending. He knows that a child had been born to a ...

129.movie_plot: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

108.movie_name: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers (1995)
108.movie_plot: Six years after Michael Myers last terrorized Haddonfield, he returns there in pursuit of his niece, Jamie Lloyd, who has escaped with her newborn child, for which Michael and a mysterious cult have sinister plans.

124.movie_name: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai (1999)
124.movie_plot: An African American mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

100.movie_plot: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

112.movie_plot: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time and now the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

101.movie_plot: After a new neighbor moved into the house next door, Charley discovers that he is an ancient vampire and goes in search for the help of Peter Vincent, a famous "vampire killer" to save his neighborhood from the creature.

110.movie_plot: A California couple and a survivalist encounter Leatherface and his family.

103.movie_plot: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.

109.movie_plot: A radio host is victimized by the cannibal family as a former Texas Marshall hunts them.

120.movie_plot: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

107.movie_name: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers (1989)
107.movie_plot: One year after the events of Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988), the Shape returns to Haddonfield once again in an attempt to kill his now-mute niece.

104.movie_plot: While Sheriff Brackett and Dr. Loomis hunt for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to hospital, and the serial killer is not far behind her.

114.movie_plot: Mrs. Voorhees is dead, and Camp Crystal Lake is shut down, but a camp next to the infamous place is stalked by an unknown assailant.

113.movie_plot: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

130.movie_plot: Norman Bates falls in love with a fallen nun who stays at the Bates Motel alongside a drifter and a curious reporter. Meanwhile, "mother" is still watching.

115.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning (1985)
115.movie_plot: The making of Friday the 13th: A New Beginning (1985) with interviews with the cast and crew.

106.movie_name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988)
106.movie_plot: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece on Halloween. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

116.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives (1986)
116.movie_plot: Tommy Jarvis goes to the graveyard to get rid of Jason Voorhees' body once and for all, but inadvertently brings him back to life instead. The newly revived killer once again seeks revenge, and Tommy may be the only one who can defeat him.

105.movie_plot: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

50.movie_plot: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

12.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

63.movie_plot: After enslavement and near extermination by an alien race in the year 3000, humanity begins to fight back.

82.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

41.movie_plot: A Chinese man who travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

2.movie_plot: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

53.movie_plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

26.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

34.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

0.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

72.movie_plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

69.movie_plot: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

16.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

14.movie_plot: When a Roman General is betrayed, and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

43.movie_plot: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

45.movie_plot: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

78.movie_plot: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

96.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

38.movie_plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home cause confusion.

76.movie_plot: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

1.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

83.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

84.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

40.movie_plot: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.

48.movie_name: Life Is Beautiful (La Vita è bella) (1997)
48.movie_plot: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

64.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

98.movie_plot: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

13.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)

24.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

65.movie_plot: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

17.movie_plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

57.movie_plot: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.
